sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均可表示"新闻，消息，情报"之意。
means: news ： 普通用词，指主要通过报纸、广播和电视等报道的事件，强调消息的新闻性。
information ： 普通用词，泛指消息、情报。
intelligence ： 特指政治、经济、文化或军事等方面的秘密情报或消息。

sentence.Network_en: The news will come as a great relief to the French authorities.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个消息会让法国当局大大松一口气。

sentence.Network_en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentence.Network_cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。

sentence.Network_en: News of 160 redundancies had sent tremors through the community.
sentence.Network_cn: 将会裁员160人的消息在该团体中掀起了一阵骚动。

(proverb)without information to the contrary you can assume that all is well

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: plural of new, translating Old French noveles or medieval Latin nova 'new things'

entry.def: News is information about a recently changed situation or a recent event.

example.ex: We waited and waited for news of him...
example.tran: 我们左等右等，盼着他的消息。

example.ex: They still haven't had any news about when they'll be able to go home...
example.tran: 他们仍然没有何时能回家的消息。

entry.def: News is information that is published in newspapers and broadcast on radio and television about recent events in the country or world or in a particular area of activity.

example.ex: We'll also have the latest sports news...
example.tran: 我们也会收到最新的体育新闻。

entry.def: The news is a television or radio broadcast which consists of information about recent events in the country or the world.

example.ex: I heard all about the bombs on the news.
example.tran: 我从新闻广播里得知了关于炸弹的全部消息。

entry.def: News is sometimes used in the names of newspapers.

If you say that someone or something is news, you mean that they are considered to be interesting and important at the moment, and that people want to hear about them on the radio and television and in newspapers.

example.tran: 谋杀案是重大新闻事件。

example.ex: If you are a celebrity, you are headline news.
example.tran: 如果你是名人，你就是头条新闻。

entry.def: If you say that something is bad news, you mean that it will cause you trouble or problems. If you say that something is good news, you mean that it will be useful or helpful to you.

example.ex: The drop in travel is bad news for the airline industry...
example.tran: 旅游热降温对航空业来说是个坏消息。

example.ex: This new attitude is good news to AIDS activists.
example.tran: 这种新态度对艾滋病活动家来说是件好事。

entry.def: If you say that something is news to you, you mean that you did not previously know what you have just been told, especially when you are surprised or annoyed about it.

example.ex: I'd certainly tell you if I knew anything, but I don't. What you're saying is news to me.
example.tran: 如果我真知道什么的话，我肯定会告诉你，可我不知道。你现在说的我都没听过。

means.word_mean: 1. new information about specific and timely events;

sentences.sentence: "we watch the 7 o'clock news every night"

means.word_mean: 4. information reported in a newspaper or news magazine;

sentences.sentence: "the news of my death was greatly exaggerated"

means.word_mean: 5. the quality of being sufficiently interesting to be reported in news bulletins;

sentences.sentence: "the judge conceded the newsworthiness of the trial"
"he is no longer news in the fashion world"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 新的, 初见的, 更新的
stems_affixes.word_buile: new新的→adj.新的, 初见的, 更新的 adv.新近
new新的→adj.新的, 初见的, 更新的 adv.新近
new新的+s复数→很多新的在一起→新闻
re重新+new新的→v.[使]更新, 使恢复

Sentence.sentence: But because you can't drive a car and watch television at the same time, rush hour became radio's prime, while music, talk, and news radio greatly enlarged their audiences.
In the morning, I just sit in comfort and read the papers to catch up with the news.
Father has told all his business friends the good news about the baby.
I have to do an interview for the evening news about a man with dozens of cats.
The good news today is that the bad news is not worse.
The good news today is that the bad news is not worse.

sentences.en: The news was announced as official.
sentences.cn: 这是以官方消息发布的。

means.word_mean: (可当作新闻内容的)人, 物, 事

jushi.english: On hearing the news through the telephone she picked up her kit and dashed out of the door.
jushi.chinese: 从电话里听到这个消息后她拿起药箱冲出门去。

jushi.english: The news was greeted with booing.
The news of their marriage was not released until three months later.
jushi.chinese: 他们结婚的消息三个月后才公开。
